name: Voltran: Explore the space
description:
A mobile isometric game that you controls a astronaut that need collects eggs samples and bring back to our base station. 

The astronaut discover that is possible to manipulate the elements existent in some areas of these planets, and change the ground with them:

Voltran is prototype concept game for mobile platforms (Android and IOS), but will be ported to PC as well (Windows, Macos, Linux and WebGL versions)

Controls

Tap LEFT + UP on screen =  Move the character to upper left

Tap on RIGHT + DOWN screen =  Move the character to down right

You can see and download some 3D voxels models used in this game for free: https://sketchfab.com/mfelipeof

Alien egg: Voxel Model
